content: Cinzia Cappiello - home page Cinzia Cappiello Home Research Publications Curriculum Vitae Teaching (in italian) Theses and Projects (in italian)Contacts Upcoming events Projects Assistant Professor Dipartimento di Elettronica, Informazione e Bioingegneria Politecnico di Milano Short Biography In July 26th 2001 Cinzia gained a University Laurea Degree in Computer Engineering at Politecnico di Milano. The thesis was entitled "A methodology to support the feasibility study in a ERP project".Advisor: Prof. Giampio Bracchi and Co-advisor: Prof. Chiara Francalanci In May 19th 2005 Cinzia gained the Ph.D.in Information Engineering at Politecnico di Milano. The thesis was entitled "Data Quality and multichannel services". Advisor: Prof. Barbara Pernici and Co-advisor: Prof. Chiara Francalanci. Currently Cinzia is Assistant Professor at Politecnico di Milano in the Information Systems group (http://isgroup.dei.polimi.it/) Research Interests Data and Information Quality: Assessment and Improvement methods in the context of service-based applications, self-healing web services, data warehouses, Web applications, mashups, IoT QoS in Web service: QoS criteria definition, QoS driven Web service design Green IT: business process annotation to support energy saving strategies identifications BPM: process modeling and service identification, quality-aware design of business processes Last papers Sicari, S., Rizzardi, A., Miorandi, D., Cappiello, C., Coen-Porisini, A.: Security policy enforcement for networked smart objects.
